${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Bonk.NAME: Bonk
${modID}:Bonk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL The image behaved. It wasted like twenty minutes of my time.

${modID}:DevastatingStrike.NAME: Devastating Strike
${modID}:DevastatingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Startup - Add a *Blood *Surge to your draw and discard piles. Unplayable while a *Blood *Surge exists. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DevastatingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Grave. Startup - Add a *Blood *Surge+ to your draw and discard piles. Unplayable while a *Blood *Surge exists. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have a Blood Surge in play.

${modID}:BloodSurge.NAME: Blood Surge
${modID}:BloodSurge.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable until you lose HP this turn. NL Gain !M! Strength and heal 1 HP for every time you lost HP this combat. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't lost HP this turn.

${modID}:Rondelmancy.NAME: Rondelmancy
${modID}:Rondelmancy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would create *Shivs, create !M! more. If you do not have hand space to create *Shivs, play them instead.

${modID}:UpdateJammer.NAME: Update Jammer
${modID}:UpdateJammer.DESCRIPTION: Orbs continue their passive effects after being Evoked.

${modID}:CruelSun.NAME: Cruel Sun
${modID}:CruelSun.DESCRIPTION: Enter Wrath. NL This turn, your Attacks are played twice. NL You cannot exit Wrath this combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CruelSun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter Wrath. NL This turn, your Attacks are played twice. NL You cannot exit Wrath this combat.

${modID}:Toxicology.NAME: Toxicology
${modID}:Toxicology.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you apply Poison while this is in your hand, apply !M! more.

${modID}:HyperPropellant.NAME: Hyper Propellant
${modID}:HyperPropellant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus this turn. You cannot Channel more Orbs until next turn.

${modID}:LivingBlade.NAME: Living Blade
${modID}:LivingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Permanently increase the number of times this hits by X. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Mordhau.NAME: Mordhau
${modID}:Mordhau.DESCRIPTION: Until the end of this turn, your attacks apply 1 ${modID}:Fracture.
${modID}:Mordhau.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Until the end of next turn, your attacks apply 1 ${modID}:Fracture.

${modID}:Splatter.NAME: Splatter
${modID}:Splatter.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply 6 Poison.
${modID}:Splatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply 6 Poison.

${modID}:StackTrace.NAME: Stack Trace
${modID}:StackTrace.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:StackTrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Add a *Dazed into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StormyPetrel.NAME: Stormy Petrel
${modID}:StormyPetrel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are in Wrath, enter Calm. If you are in Calm, enter Wrath.

${modID}:Spinebuster.NAME: Spinebuster
${modID}:Spinebuster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! ${modID}:Fracture.

${modID}:Plunge.NAME: Plunge
${modID}:Plunge.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Poison. If the target already has Poison, apply !M! more.

${modID}:SpiritWalk.NAME: Spirit Walk
${modID}:SpiritWalk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are in Wrath, add a *Safety to your hand. If you are in Calm, add a *Smite to your hand. Exit your Stance.

${modID}:BatteringRam.NAME: Battering Ram
${modID}:BatteringRam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you attack an enemy this turn, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Vanish.NAME: Vanish
${modID}:Vanish.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Poison for every card that was discarded this combat.
${modID}:Vanish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Poison (+3) for every card that was discarded this combat.

${modID}:PublicVoid.NAME: Public Void
${modID}:PublicVoid.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a cost 0 card, trigger the passive ability of all Dark Orbs.

${modID}:FindThePieces.NAME: Find the Pieces
${modID}:FindThePieces.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Mantra for every card in your hand that was created this combat.
${modID}:FindThePieces.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain 1 Mantra for every card in your hand that was created this combat.
